description: Demolition of 35-37 Queensland Road and change of use of site to provide a Recyclables Storage Area with a new access from Queensland Road in replacement of the facilities currently located off Queensland Place.  Associated engineering works and erection of boundary fence. Alterations to the Waste Transfer Station including demolition of a single storey office and provision of two new weighbridges and portakabin offices and widening of existing gated entrance from Queensland Place and erection of new gates. These works allow for the alteration of the access route via Ashburton Grove to via Queensland Road.
decision_conditions: THIS DECISION WAS GIVEN BY LETTER DATED 20/12/02 PLEASE SEE THIS LETTER FOR CONDITIONS WHICH HAVE NOT BEEN ENTERED IN PACIS
